intro: Team up with the most unusual crime-fighting duo as a rookie detective and his zombie partner break all the rules to solve impossible cases!
description:
When rookie detective Tamura finally achieves his dream job, he discovers his new senior partner is experienced, brilliant - and literally a zombie! Together, this mismatched pair tackles cases no one else can solve.

Features:
- A Buddy Cop Adventure with a Supernatural Twist!
Combine the zombie detective's unique investigative abilities with the rookie's sharp deduction skills to crack each case. Watch as the earnest but awkward Detective Tamura works alongside his free-spirited undead mentor in this unconventional partnership!

- Mystery with a Side of Humor!
Enjoy both serious detective work and hilarious character interactions! This mystery adventure delivers laughs, surprises, and edge-of-your-seat suspense.

- Gather Evidence, Make Deductions, Catch Culprits!
Analyze clues and testimonies to unravel each mystery. Your choices affect case outcomes, with multiple endings to discover!

- Perfect Weekend Game!
Complete in 5-8 hours - ideal for busy gamers looking for a well-paced adventure.

- Zombie Content Without the Horror!
No scary or grotesque elements - just charming, comedic characters and engaging storytelling.

- Beginner-Friendly Detective Work!
Struggling with a puzzle? Use the "Reflect Before Deduction" feature for guidance, or skip to the solution if you're truly stuck.
